properties.areaDesc: Croatan and Roanoke Sounds; Alligator River; Albemarle Sound; S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 30 at 3:03PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
Sustained winds of 15 to 20 kt, with occasional gusts of 25 to 30
kt are possible across the marine waters north of Oregon Inlet,
including the Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Alligator
River, and the coastal waters. Winds will begin to gradually
subside around sunset.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should consider avoiding navigating for the rest of the
afternoon.

NWSheadline: GUSTY WINDS NORTH OF OREGON INLET THIS AFTERNOON
